QuestData.Title: The Silent Skull: The First Reagent
QuestData.Description:
Grinning Tolg was in the process of brewing an elixir that would allow him to communicate with the ravagers, whom the Skulltaker relies on to remain hidden.
The first ingredient, the leaves of the Shadethistle plant, can be found nearby. The journal reads:
"It rests in the shadows of the harsh Gorgrond sun. I saw some under standing stones near the black iron walls."
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the clue from the journal to find the Shadethisle Leaves.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to find the Shadethistle Leaves
